home.title: Hello, I am Santiago
home.body: Graphic Designer, 3D Artist, Web & Game Developer and a Professional Hobbyist

about.title: About me
about.body: Hello there! My name is Santiago Degetau, I am a twenty-something year old designer & developer living in Mexico. I have over five years of work experience in graphic design, more than two years of programming know-how and an unlimited drive to learn and improve every day.
